name: Nova Query
query:
Select rececoes.DocTypeRececao DocType, rececoes.NrRececao OrderID, rececoes.DocTypeCompraRececao DocTypeOri,rececoes.NrCompraRececao OCOri,compras.nrMRPCompra MRPOri,ops.PartnerName,ops.ItemID, compras.Fornecedor, 
rececoes.ItemRececao CodArtigo, rececoes.QtdRececao QtdRecebida, compras.QtdComprada QtdPedida,compras.QtySatisf, 
CAST(IIF(compras.QtdComprada>0,((compras.QtySatisf*100)/compras.QtdComprada),0)-100 as decimal(18,2)) percExcesso,
rececoes.DataRececao, compras.DataCompra, FORMAT(rececoes.PrecoRececao, 'C3', 'de-DE') PrecoRececao, FORMAT(compras.PrecoCompra, 'C3', 'de-DE') PrecoCompras,FORMAT(compras.TotalCompra, 'C3', 'de-DE') TotValue,
FORMAT(IIF(compras.PrecoCompra>0,(compras.QtySatisf-compras.QtdComprada)*compras.PrecoCompra,0), 'C3', 'de-DE') TotValueExcesso
from (Select cod.DocType DocTypeRececao, cod.OrderID NrRececao, cod.ItemID ItemRececao, CAST(cod.CreationDateTime as date) DataRececao,codo.DocTypeOri DocTypeCompraRececao,codo.OrderIDOri NrCompraRececao, 
AVG(UnitPrice) PrecoRececao,SUM(TotValue) TotalRececao, SUM(cod.QtySatisf) QtdRececao 
from ClientOrderDetails cod
join ClientOrderDetailsOri codo on cod.DocType=codo.DocType and cod.OrderID=codo.OrderID and cod.OrderRow=codo.OrderRow
Where cod.DocType='RC'
Group by cod.DocType, cod.OrderID, cod.ItemID, CAST(cod.CreationDateTime as date),codo.DocTypeOri,codo.OrderIDOri) rececoes

join
(Select cod.DocType DocTypeCompra, cod.OrderID NrCompra, cod.ItemID ItemCompra, CAST(cod.CreationDateTime as date) DataCompra,codo.DocTypeOri DocTypeMRPCompra,codo.OrderIDOri nrMRPCompra,PartnerName Fornecedor,
AVG(UnitPrice) PrecoCompra,SUM(cod.QtyOrd)*AVG(UnitPrice) TotalCompra, SUM(cod.QtyOrd) QtdComprada, SUM(cod.QtySatisf) QtySatisf
from ClientOrderDetails cod
join (Select Distinct DocType, OrderID, DocTypeOri, OrderIDOri from ClientOrderDetailsOri where DocTypeOri='MRP') codo on cod.DocType=codo.DocType and cod.OrderID=codo.OrderID
join (Select Distinct DocType, OrderID, ClientID, p.PartnerName from ClientOrders co 
        join (Select PartnerID, PartnerName From BusinessPartners Where PartnerType='F') p on p.PartnerID=co.ClientID Where DocType='OC') client 
on client.DocType=cod.DocType and client.OrderID=codo.OrderID
Where cod.DocType='OC'
Group by cod.DocType, cod.OrderID, cod.ItemID, CAST(cod.CreationDateTime as date),codo.DocTypeOri,codo.OrderIDOri, PartnerName) compras
on compras.DocTypeCompra=rececoes.DocTypeCompraRececao and compras.NrCompra=rececoes.NrCompraRececao and compras.ItemCompra=rececoes.ItemRececao

join
(Select DISTINCT opOri.DocType, opOri.OrderID, clients.ClientID, clients.PartnerName, itens.ItemID, oc.ItemID Componente
from (Select DISTINCT DocType, OrderID,OrderRow, DocTypeOri, OrderIDOri from ClientOrderDetailsOri Where DocType='OC' and DocTypeOri in ('OP', 'OPC')) opOri
join (Select DocType, OrderID,OrderRow,  ItemID from ClientOrderDetails Where DocType='OC') oc
on oc.DocType=opOri.DocType and oc.OrderID=opOri.OrderID and oc.OrderRow=opOri.OrderRow
join (Select DISTINCT DocType, OrderID, ClientID, bp.PartnerName 
        from ClientOrders co
        join BusinessPartners bp on bp.PartnerID=co.ClientID and PartnerType='C' and DocType in ('OP', 'OPC')) clients on clients.DocType=opOri.DocTypeOri and clients.OrderID=opOri.OrderIDOri
join (Select DISTINCT DocType, OrderID, ItemID from ClientOrderDetails Where DocType in ('OP', 'OPC')) itens on itens.DocType=opOri.DocTypeOri and itens.OrderID=opOri.OrderIDOri) ops
on ops.DocType=rececoes.DocTypeCompraRececao and ops.OrderID=rececoes.NrCompraRececao and ops.Componente=rececoes.ItemRececao

Where rececoes.DataRececao>=DATEADD(Day, -1, convert(date,CAST(GETDATE() as date))) and IIF(compras.QtdComprada>0,((compras.QtySatisf*100)/compras.QtdComprada),0)>103

name: Create Template Email
func:
let euroGerman = Intl.NumberFormat("de-DE", { minimumFractionDigits: 0, }); var values = msg.payload var html_aux = "" var date = new Date() var dateNow = (date.getDate()-1) + "/" + (date.getMonth() + 1) + "/" + date.getFullYear() values.map(i => { html_aux = html_aux + "" html_aux = html_aux + "" + i.PartnerName + "" html_aux = html_aux + "" + i.ItemID + "" html_aux = html_aux + "" + i.DocType + "." + i.OrderID + "" html_aux = html_aux + "" + i.DocTypeOri + "." + i.OCOri + "" html_aux = html_aux + "" + i.Fornecedor + "" html_aux = html_aux + "" + i.CodArtigo + "" /*html_aux = html_aux + "" + i.DescArtigo + ""*/ html_aux = html_aux + "" + i.QtdPedida + "" html_aux = html_aux + "" + i.QtdRecebida + "" html_aux = html_aux + "" + i.QtySatisf + "" html_aux = html_aux + "" + i.percExcesso + "%" html_aux = html_aux + "" + i.TotValueExcesso + "" html_aux = html_aux + "" }) var html = "" + "" + "" + "" + "" + "" + "

Bom Dia.

" + "
" + "

MAPA DE EXCEDENTES DE " + dateNow + "

" + "
" + "
" + "" + "" + "" + "" + "" + "" + "" + "" + /*"" +*/ "" + "" + "" + "" + "" + "" html = html + html_aux html = html + "
ClienteModeloDoc ReceçãoDoc CompraFornecedorCod ArtigoDesc ArtigoQtd PedidaQtd RecebidaQtd Recebida Total% ExcessoValor Total Excesso €
" msg.payload = html msg.plaintext = 'text:html' msg.topic = 'MAPA DE EXCEDENTES FSM DE ' + dateNow + "." msg.from = 'ricardo.ferreira@fsm.pt' return msg;

name: Antiga Query
query:
Select codRececao.DocType, codRececao.OrderID, codRececao.OrderRow, codo.DocTypeOri,codo.OrderIDOri OCOri,codCompras.mrpOrigem MRPOri,codCompras.OPOri,productions.PartnerName, productions.ItemID, codCompras.PartnerName Fornecedor, 
codRececao.ItemID CodArtigo,codCompras.ItemDesc DescArtigo, codRececao.QtySatisf QtdRecebida, codCompras.QtyOrd QtdPedida,codCompras.QtySatisf,opComp.TotQty QtdOP, 
CAST(IIF(codCompras.QtyOrd>0,((codCompras.QtySatisf*100)/codCompras.QtyOrd),0)-100 as decimal(18,2)) percExcesso,
codRececao.CreationDateTime DataRececao, codCompras.DataCompra, FORMAT(codRececao.UnitPrice, 'C3', 'de-DE') PrecoRececao, FORMAT(codCompras.UnitPrice, 'C3', 'de-DE') PrecoCompras,FORMAT(codCompras.TotValue, 'C3', 'de-DE') TotValue,
FORMAT(IIF(codCompras.UnitPrice>0,(codCompras.QtySatisf-codCompras.QtyOrd)*codCompras.UnitPrice,0), 'C3', 'de-DE') TotValueExcesso
from ClientOrderDetails codRececao join ClientOrderDetailsOri codo on codRececao.OrderID=codo.OrderID and codRececao.OrderRow=codo.OrderRow and codo.DocType='RC'
join (SELECT cod.DocType, cod.OrderID, cod.OrderRow, co.ClientID, bp.PartnerName, co.RequesterID,mrp.OrderIDOri mrpOrigem,op.DocTypeOri,op.OrderIDOri OPOri, cod.ItemID, im.ItemDesc, 
	            cod.QtyOrd, cod.QtySatisf, cod.Unit, cod.UnitPrice, (cod.UnitPrice * cod.QtyOrd * (1+(cod.PerCstAdic /100) )) TotValue, cod.PerCstAdic, co.Currency, cod.StartConfectionDate, cod.EndConfectionDate, cod.EndConfectionDateReal, 
	            cod.ProductionStatus, cod.WHID, cod.CreationDateTime DataCompra
            FROM ClientOrderDetails cod (NOLOCK)
            JOIN DocumentStatus ds (NOLOCK) on ds.DocType = cod.doctype and ds.DocStatusID = cod.ProductionStatus   AND ds.IsAnulated = 0 
            JOIN ItemMaster im (NOLOCK) on im.ItemID = cod.ItemID
            JOIN ClientOrders co (NOLOCK) on co.DocType = cod.DocType and co.OrderID = cod.OrderID
            JOIN (Select DISTINCT OrderID,OrderRow, DocTypeOri, OrderIDOri from ClientOrderDetailsOri Where DocType='OC' and DocTypeOri='MRP') mrp on mrp.OrderID=co.OrderID and mrp.OrderRow=cod.OrderRow
            JOIN (Select DISTINCT OrderID,OrderRow, DocTypeOri, OrderIDOri from ClientOrderDetailsOri Where DocType='OC' and DocTypeOri in ('OP','OPC')) op on op.OrderID=co.OrderID and op.OrderRow=cod.OrderRow
            JOIN BusinessPartners bp (NOLOCK) on bp.PartnerID = co.ClientID and bp.PartnerType='F'
            WHERE co.DocType = 'OC' ) codCompras on codCompras.DocType=codo.DocTypeOri and codCompras.OrderID=codo.OrderIDOri and codCompras.OrderRow=codo.OrderRowOri and codCompras.ItemID=codRececao.ItemID
and codRececao.ItemId=codCompras.ItemID
join (Select DISTINCT cod.DocType,cod.OrderID, cod.ItemID, cod.ItemDesc1, p.PartnerName
from ClientOrderDetails cod
join ClientOrders co on co.OrderID=cod.OrderID and co.DocType=cod.DocType
JOIN BusinessPartners p on co.ClientID=p.PartnerID and p.PartnerType='C'
Where cod.DocType in ('OP', 'OPC')) productions on productions.OrderID=codCompras.OPOri and productions.DocType=codCompras.DocTypeOri
join (Select DocType, OrderID, ComponentID, SUM(UnitQty) UnitQty, SUM(TotQty) TotQty, AVG(UnitPrice) UnitPrice
from ClientOrderComp
Where DocType in ('OP', 'OPC')
Group by DocType, OrderID, ComponentID) opComp on opComp.DocType=productions.DocType and opComp.OrderID=productions.OrderID and codRececao.ItemID=opComp.ComponentID
Where codRececao.DocType='RC' and codRececao.CreationDateTime>=DATEADD(Day, -1, convert(date,FORMAT(GETDATE(),'yyyy-MM-dd'))) and IIF(codCompras.QtyOrd>0,((codCompras.QtySatisf*100)/codCompras.QtyOrd),0)>103
Order by productions.ItemID

name: Dutti Senhora
query:
Select CAST(SUM(m.TotValue) as decimal(18,0)) as Soma, YEAR(m.DATADOC) ano
From DocMovs m, Partners p, ItemMaster i
Where m.AreaCod='Vendas' and p.PartnerID=m.PartnerID and p.PartnerType='C' and YEAR(m.DataDoc)>=YEAR(GETDATE())-3
and p.PartnerID='6' and i.ItemID=m.ItemID and SubCategoryDescr='SENHORA'
Group by YEAR(m.DATADOC)
Order by ano DESC

Select CAST(SUM(m.TotValue) as decimal(18,0)) as Soma

Where m.AreaCod='Vendas' and p.PartnerID=m.PartnerID and p.PartnerType='C' and YEAR(m.DataDoc)=YEAR(GETDATE())
and p.PartnerID='6' and i.ItemID=m.ItemID and SubCategoryDescr='SENHORA'

and p.PartnerID='6' and i.ItemID=m.ItemID and SubCategoryDescr='SENHORA'

and p.PartnerID='6' and i.ItemID=m.ItemID and SubCategoryDescr='SENHORA'

and p.PartnerID='6' and i.ItemID=m.ItemID and SubCategoryDescr='SENHORA'


Select CAST(SUM(m.TotValue) as decimal(18,0)) as Soma, YEAR(DATADOC) ano
From DocMovs m, Partners p, ItemMaster i
Where m.AreaCod='Vendas' and p.PartnerID=m.PartnerID and p.PartnerType='C' and MONTH(m.DataDoc)=MONTH (GETDATE())
and p.PartnerID='6' and i.ItemID=m.ItemID and SubCategoryDescr='SENHORA'

Order by ano DESC

name: Stear Casacos
query:
Select CAST(SUM(m.TotValue) as decimal(18,0)) as Soma, YEAR(m.DATADOC) ano
From DocMovs m, Partners p, ItemMaster i
Where m.AreaCod='Vendas' and p.PartnerID=m.PartnerID and p.PartnerType='C' and YEAR(m.DataDoc)>=YEAR(GETDATE())-3
and p.PartnerID='3' and i.ItemID=m.ItemID and CategoryDescr='CASACO'
Group by YEAR(m.DATADOC)
Order by ano DESC

From DocMovs m, Partners p, ItemMaster i

name: Plan Entregas Portugal
query:
Select cli.PartnerName Cliente,d.ItemID, SubCategoryDescr, CategoryDescr, SUM(QtyDoc) QtyDoc, AVG(d.UnitPrice) UnitPrice, CAST(SUM(TotValue) as decimal(18,0)) Total,
                        DateAdd(HOUR, 1,d.DataDoc) as DataDoc, f.PartnerName Fabrica
                        from DocMovs d
                        join (Select PartnerName, PartnerID from Partners WHere PartnerType='F' and PartnerGroup in ('PT_OUTROS', 'PT_FSM')) f on f.PartnerID=d.PartnerID
                        join (Select PartnerID, PartnerName from Partners Where PartnerType='C') cli on cli.PartnerID=d.PartnerIDENC
                        join (Select ItemID,ItemDESC, SubCategoryDescr, CategoryDescr from ItemMaster) i on i.ItemID=d.ItemID
                        Where AreaCod='Planeamento' and SubAreaCod='PLANENTREGAS' and YEAR(DataDoc)>=YEAR(GETDATE()) and DATADOC>=DATEADD(DAY, 1-DATEPART(WEEKDAY, GETDATE()), GETDATE()) and DATADOC<=DATEADD(day,7,DATEADD(DAY, 1-DATEPART(WEEKDAY, GETDATE()), GETDATE()))
                        Group by d.ItemID, SubCategoryDescr, CategoryDescr, DataDoc, f.PartnerName, cli.PartnerName
                        Order by d.DataDoc
                        

Select cli.PartnerName Cliente,d.ItemID, SubCategoryDescr, CategoryDescr, SUM(QtyDoc) QtyDoc, AVG(d.UnitPrice) UnitPrice, CAST(SUM(TotValue) as decimal(18,0)) Total,
                        DateAdd(HOUR, 1,d.DataDoc) as DataDoc, f.PartnerName Fabrica
                        from DocMovs d
                        join (Select PartnerName, PartnerID from Partners WHere PartnerType='F' and PartnerGroup in ('MA_FSM','MA_FES-MEK', 'MA_TANGER')) f on f.PartnerID=d.PartnerID
                        join (Select PartnerID, PartnerName from Partners Where PartnerType='C') cli on cli.PartnerID=d.PartnerIDENC
                        join (Select ItemID,ItemDESC, SubCategoryDescr, CategoryDescr from ItemMaster) i on i.ItemID=d.ItemID
                        Where AreaCod='Planeamento' and SubAreaCod='PLANENTREGAS' and YEAR(DataDoc)>=YEAR(GETDATE()) and DATADOC>=DATEADD(DAY, 1-DATEPART(WEEKDAY, GETDATE()), GETDATE()) and DATADOC<=DATEADD(day,7,DATEADD(DAY, 1-DATEPART(WEEKDAY, GETDATE()), GETDATE()))
                        Group by d.ItemID, SubCategoryDescr, CategoryDescr, DataDoc, f.PartnerName, cli.PartnerName
                        Order by d.DataDoc

Select SUM(QtyDoc) QtyDoc, CAST(SUM(TotValue) as decimal(18,0)) Total, DATEPART(week, DataDoc) Week
                        from DocMovs d
                        join (Select PartnerID, PartnerName from Partners Where PartnerType='F' and PartnerGroup in ('PT_OUTROS', 'PT_FSM')) f on f.PartnerID=d.PartnerID
                        join (Select ItemID,ItemDESC, SubCategoryDescr, CategoryDescr from ItemMaster) i on i.ItemID=d.ItemID
                        Where AreaCod='Planeamento' and SubAreaCod='PLANENTREGAS' and YEAR(DataDoc)>=YEAR(GETDATE()) and DATADOC>=DATEADD(DAY, 1-DATEPART(WEEKDAY, GETDATE()), GETDATE()) and DATADOC<=DATEADD(day,7,DATEADD(DAY, 1-DATEPART(WEEKDAY, GETDATE()), GETDATE()))
                        Group by DATEPART(week, DataDoc)
                        Order by Week

Select SUM(QtyDoc) QtyDoc, CAST(SUM(TotValue) as decimal(18,0)) Total, DATEPART(week, DataDoc) Week
                        from DocMovs d
                        join (Select PartnerID, PartnerName from Partners Where PartnerType='F' and PartnerGroup in ('MA_FSM','MA_FES-MEK', 'MA_TANGER')) f on f.PartnerID=d.PartnerID
                        join (Select ItemID,ItemDESC, SubCategoryDescr, CategoryDescr from ItemMaster) i on i.ItemID=d.ItemID
                        Where AreaCod='Planeamento' and SubAreaCod='PLANENTREGAS' and YEAR(DataDoc)>=YEAR(GETDATE()) and DATADOC>=DATEADD(DAY, 1-DATEPART(WEEKDAY, GETDATE()), GETDATE()) and DATADOC<=DATEADD(day,7,DATEADD(DAY, 1-DATEPART(WEEKDAY, GETDATE()), GETDATE()))
                        Group by DATEPART(week, DataDoc)
                        Order by Week

name: Margens
query:
Select pname cliente,m.partnerID idpartner, SUM(ValorVenda) ValorVenda,
                                SUM(CustoMP) CustoMP, SUM(CustoMOD) CustoMOD, SUM(CustoCA) CustoCA,(case when SUM(ValorVenda) > 0 then cast(((((SUM(ValorVenda) - SUM(CustoMP) - SUM(CustoMod) - SUM(CustoCA)) / SUM(ValorVenda)) * 100)) as money) else 0 end) Margem
                                From Margens m
                                Where ano=YEAR(GETDATE())
                                Group by pname,m.partnerID
                                HAVING (SUM(ValorVenda)>0 or SUM(CustoMP)>0 or SUM(CustoMOD)>0 or SUM(CustoCA)>0)
                                Order by ValorVenda DESC

name: Amostras
query:
Select p.PartnerID, p.PartnerName, SUM(QtyOrd) Total
from ClientOrderDetails cod
join ClientOrders co on cod.DocType=co.DocType and cod.OrderID=co.OrderID
join BusinessPartners p on p.PartnerID=co.ClientID and p.PartnerType='C'
join ItemMasterDetailsVersion imdv on imdv.ItemId=cod.ItemID and imdv.Version=cod.Versao
Where cod.DocType='PA' and YEAR(cod.CreationDateTime)=YEAR(GETDATE()) and cod.ProductionStatus!='ANULADA'
and imdv.VersionName not like '%intertek%'
group by p.PartnerID, p.PartnerName
Order by Total DESC

Select p.PartnerID, p.PartnerName, SUM(QtyOrd) Total
from ClientOrderDetails cod
join ClientOrders co on cod.DocType=co.DocType and cod.OrderID=co.OrderID
join BusinessPartners p on p.PartnerID=co.ClientID and p.PartnerType='C'
join ItemMasterDetailsVersion imdv on imdv.ItemId=cod.ItemID and imdv.Version=cod.Versao
Where cod.DocType='PA' and YEAR(cod.CreationDateTime)=YEAR(GETDATE()) and cod.ProductionStatus!='ANULADA'
and cod.CreationDateTime>=DATEADD(DAY, 1-DATEPART(WEEKDAY, GETDATE()), GETDATE()) and cod.CreationDateTime<=DATEADD(day,7,DATEADD(DAY, 1-DATEPART(WEEKDAY, GETDATE()), GETDATE()))
and imdv.VersionName not like '%intertek%'
group by p.PartnerID, p.PartnerName
Order by Total DESC

from ClientOrderDetails cod
join ClientOrders co on cod.DocType=co.DocType and cod.OrderID=co.OrderID

join ItemMasterDetailsVersion imdv on imdv.ItemId=cod.ItemID and imdv.Version=cod.Versao

Order by Total DESC

	group by p.PartnerID, p.PartnerName

	group by p.PartnerID, p.PartnerName

Begin

WITH sample_counts AS (
    Select SUM(QtyOrd) total_samples
	from ClientOrderDetails cod
	join ClientOrders co on cod.DocType=co.DocType and cod.OrderID=co.OrderID
	Where cod.DocType='PA' and YEAR(cod.CreationDateTime)=YEAR(GETDATE()) and cod.ProductionStatus!='ANULADA'
),
order_counts AS (
    Select COUNT(*) total_orders
from (Select Distinct ItemID, ClientID
		from ClientOrderDetails cod
		join ClientOrders co on co.DocType=cod.DocType and co.OrderID=cod.OrderID
		Where cod.docType='OP' and  YEAR(cod.CreationDateTime)=YEAR(GETDATE()) and cod.ProductionStatus!='ANULADA' and 
		cod.OrderID like '99%' and cod.IDIntegration!='' and cod.IDIntegration is not null and cod.IDIntegration!='N/DEF' and cod.QtyOrd>0) co
)
-- Unindo as duas contagens
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN oc.total_orders = 0 THEN NULL
        ELSE sc.total_samples / oc.total_orders
    END AS racio
FROM 
    sample_counts sc, order_counts oc
END

Begin
WITH sample_counts AS (
    Select p.PartnerID, p.PartnerName, SUM(QtyOrd) total_samples
	from ClientOrderDetails cod
	join ClientOrders co on cod.DocType=co.DocType and cod.OrderID=co.OrderID
	join BusinessPartners p on p.PartnerID=co.ClientID and p.PartnerType='C'
	Where cod.DocType='PA' and YEAR(cod.CreationDateTime)=YEAR(GETDATE()) and cod.ProductionStatus!='ANULADA'
	group by p.PartnerID, p.PartnerName
),
order_counts AS (
    Select p.PartnerID, p.PartnerName,COUNT(*) total_orders
from (Select Distinct ItemID, ClientID
		from ClientOrderDetails cod
		join ClientOrders co on co.DocType=cod.DocType and co.OrderID=cod.OrderID
		Where cod.docType='OP' and  YEAR(cod.CreationDateTime)=YEAR(GETDATE()) and cod.ProductionStatus!='ANULADA'
        and cod.OrderID like '99%' and cod.IDIntegration!='' and cod.IDIntegration is not null and cod.IDIntegration!='N/DEF' and cod.QtyOrd>0) co
	join BusinessPartners p on p.PartnerID=co.ClientID and p.PartnerType='C'
	group by p.PartnerID, p.PartnerName
)
-- Unindo as duas contagens
SELECT
	sc.PartnerID,
	sc.PartnerName,
    sc.total_samples amostras,
    oc.total_orders encomendas,
    CASE 
        WHEN oc.total_orders = 0 THEN NULL
        ELSE sc.total_samples / oc.total_orders
    END AS racio
FROM 
    sample_counts sc
LEFT JOIN 
    order_counts oc ON sc.PartnerID = oc.PartnerID
    Order by total_samples DESC
END
